token_info.name: Synthcity Streets - EP 1: Crypto Craze - Deluxe Edition
token_info.description: Welcome to Synthcity, the city where all dreams can come true! If the crime and inhospitable conditions don’t get to you first that is. With the recent market slump for crypto, everyone is wanting a piece of the action, crime lords have flocked to Synthcity with an all powerful crime syndicate leading the way. Play the first episode of Synthcity Streets and try your hand at taking back the streets of Synthcity! Controls - Arrow keys to move, Z,X,C for punch, kick and block. Space to jump, ESC, Enter and left click to navigate menus and cutscenes Please use a desktop browser - Works with Chrome, MS Edge, Brave doesn’t seem to like WebGLs however. Play in full screen for the best experience Thank you for playing Synthcity Streets, please consider purchasing the game to help fund future episodes | @Discowarlock on twitter, dm any questions or bugs                           Note Deluxe Edition Includes Alternate Hero Skin for Felix, DM @DiscoWarlock for unlock code
